trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Thetford Mines
There was one other sighting in Thetford Mines on or around September 19th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi returned to the same location where i had observed a ufo-shaped cylinder. with a friend we walked to the top of the hill. when the sunset came we went down the hill. when darkness came a 19.45, a mysterious light appeared in the sky. i do not know if it was a star, a satellite? it gradually rose in the sky. we stayed about 20 minutes, i watched the light while chatting. we finally left the place, even if the light was still rising in the sky. around 23:00, the light still shining in the sky, but has a much higher altitude. the light disappeared thereafter. fox news and cnn did stories with this mysterious light. several witnesses reported their testimony mufon and other websites. a photo was taken was from maine. and i am enclosing a drawing of what i saw was september 19, 2009 7:45 p.m. nasa says it was a rocket experiment, and frankly i do not know if it's true or not, but if it's true that i would again because many people have enjoyed the show! ufo over east coast massachusetts to virginia september 19, 2009 http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=zqustezhy3g&translated=1 ufo nasa may have caused strange light in the sky by black brant xii http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=7yzoettoemc&feature=related
